br.octahedron.cotopaxi.controller.filter
Interface Filter

public interface Filter

A Request filter. It specify methods to be executed before or after the model execution. It can be used to modify input values or to clear the house after model execution, for example.

Author:
Danilo Penna Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br

Method Summary
 void doAfter(RequestWrapper requestWrapper, ActionResponse response)
          Executed after the model be executed, but before the response be processed.
 void doBefore(RequestWrapper requestWrapper)
          Executed before the model be executed.
 

Method Detail

doBefore

void doBefore(RequestWrapper requestWrapper)
